# Bug Report

Thank you for helping us improve TimeWarden! Please provide as much detail as possible to help us diagnose and fix the issue.

## Bug Description

A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## Steps to Reproduce

Provide a step-by-step guide on how to reproduce the bug.

1. Go to [Specific Page/Section]
2. Perform [Action 1]
3. Perform [Action 2]
4. Observe [Unexpected Behavior]

## Expected Behavior

Describe what you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior

Describe what actually happened. Please include any error messages or console logs.

## Environment

*   **Browser:** (e.g., Chrome 126, Firefox 115)
*   **Operating System:** (e.g., Windows 11, macOS Sonoma, Ubuntu 22.04)
*   **TimeWarden Version:** (If you know it, e.g., v1.2.3 - Check extension details)
*   **Related Extensions:** (List any other browser extensions that might conflict)

## Screenshots or Screen Recordings

If possible, please attach screenshots or a short screen recording that illustrates the bug.

## Additional Context

Any other information about the problem that might be helpful (e.g., when it started happening, specific websites affected, your privacy settings).

## System Diagnostics (Optional)

If you are comfortable sharing, you can export diagnostic information from TimeWarden (if the feature is available) and attach it here. This can help us understand your setup better.

---

*If you are reporting a security vulnerability, please refer to our [SECURITY.md](https://github.com/chirag127/TimeWarden-AI-Powered-Time-Tracking-Browser-Extension/security/policy) file.*
